greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{k=1..n} (9*k - 1); 9-factorial numbers.
formula: a(n) = (-1)^n*Sum_{k=0..n} 9^k*s(n+1,n+1-k), where s(n,k) are the Stirling numbers of the first kind, A048994. - _Mircea Merca_, May 03 2012
G.f.: 1/Q(0) where Q(k) = 1 - x*(9*k+8)/(1 - x*(9*k+9)/Q(k+1) ) (continued fraction). (End)
mathematica: s=1;lst={s};Do[s+=n*s;AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 7, 2*5!, 9}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 08 2008 *)
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
ext: a(9) (originally given incorrectly as 1011636305971200) corrected by _Peter Bala_, Feb 20 2015
a(16) corrected and incorrect MAGMA program removed by _Georg Fischer_, May 10 2021
